/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, stretches out below, flanked by towering buildings on either side. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the clear blue sky, punctuated by a few scattered clouds. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along its length, adding a dynamic element to the scene. In the distance, power lines crisscross the sky, a testament to the city's infrastructure. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
